section.title: Hi, my name is Yevhen
section.about-text-1: Developer with 4 years of experience creating high-performance web solutions.
section.about-text-2: I specialize in developing reactive interfaces using React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript, ensuring excellent user experience.
section.about-text-3: The key value of my work is combining technical expertise with understanding of business goals, which allows me to create not just beautiful, but also functional solutions that increase conversion and user engagement.
section.contact-text: Let's connect and discuss how I can help you create high-quality, responsive, and scalable web solutions.
